package.name: No2Theft手机保护-Rootless
package.shortDescription: The most complete tweak against pranksters, annoying nosy people and thieves感谢来了老弟分享！The most complete tweak against pranksters, annoying nosy people and thieves这是一款手机保护插件，比如说谁动了你的手机会自动发出报警声音或者自动拍照发到你的邮箱！时刻保护你的手机！来了老弟汉化分享！
